com.conceptwave.scripting
Class OrderItem

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject
          com.conceptwave.scripting.OrderItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Document, OrderGroup
public class OrderItem
extends CwObject

Base order item type. Represents a data object that can be part of order. Document and Order objects are OrderItem objects too.

Field Summary

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean attachments
READONLY: Returns true if the object is allowed to have attachments

hasAttachment

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean hasAttachment
READWRITE: Returns true if the order item has attachments. Updates "hasAttachment" property of the order item. Use the property to manually set the "Attachment" flag.

isCollection

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isCollection
READONLY: Checks if the order item is collection

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isDocument
READONLY: Returns true is the order item instance of Document

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isInstance
READONLY: Checks if current order node is a collection instance

isSingleDocCollectionInstance

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isSingleDocCollectionInstance
READONLY: Returns true is the order item is a collection instance with only one child document defined in metadata

isTop

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isTop
READONLY: Checks if current order node is a top node

metadataTypeNumber

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer metadataTypeNumber
READONLY: Gets order item's metadata type number

orderDataPath

public String orderDataPath
READONLY: Gets the order item data path. For the top order item the path is empty string. The order path contains the metadata names of the parent order items separated by periods. If a collection instance is included in the path the corresponding path item is the collection index. The path collection indexes are not consecutive and cannot be used as array indexes.

parentOrderItem

public OrderItem parentOrderItem
READONLY: Parent order item for order item contained within a order group node.

topOrder

public Order topOrder
READONLY: Returns the top order object.

public Document addAttachment(String description,
                              String fileName,
                              String type,
                              String content)
Adds attachment to an order item.

Parameters:
description - Attachment description.
fileName - Attachment file name (can be null).
type - Attachment MIME type (can be null).
content - Note content.
Returns:
The attachment document.

                             com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean storeTheCopy)
Extracts a subtree of the order, adds it to another order and optionally stores the copy in the database.

Parameters:
parent - Order to copy subtree into.
storeTheCopy - Flag indicating database storage.
Returns:
Copied subtree.

deleteItem

public OrderItem deleteItem()
Deletes the current order item item from the Order object in the memory and from the database.

expandCollapse

public void expandCollapse(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean expand)
Expand/collapse order item node.

Parameters:
expand - boolean True expands the node, false collapses.

getAttachments

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object[] getAttachments(String docId,
                                                         String ordId)
Returns a collection of cwf.attachmentDoc which is associate to the calling document by docId or topOrderId. Returns null if the document has no attachment. With the returned collection, user is able to retrive the attached file based on each attachDoc in the collection
eg. var attachDoc1 = parent.addAttachment();
var attachDoc2 = parent.addAttachment();
var attachDocs = parent.getAttachments()
FileReader fr = attachDocs[0].getAttachment(); // returned filereader is the file attached to attachDoc1

getItemState

public String getItemState()
Gets the current order item state.

Returns:
The state of the order item. Can be null.

getProcessId

public String getProcessId()
Gets the order item process id. substitution method is provided

Returns:
The process id associated with the item or "0" if no process is associated with this order.

getVisualKeyDocument

public Document getVisualKeyDocument()
Gets document that has to be used as visual key for the order item

Returns:

isValid

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isValid(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean validateCodes)
Runs the order validation.

Parameters:
validateCodes - Optional. If true the fields that contain codes are verified against the code table
Returns:
True if valid.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the current object is not part of order

Select next displayed order item.

selectPrevious

public void selectPrevious()
Select previous displayed order item.

setItemState

public void setItemState(String state)
Sets the current order item state in the memory. If the item is order itself does not perform database save operation (see state).

Parameters:
state - The new state of the order item. Can be null.

setProcessId

public String setProcessId(String procId)
Sets the order item process id.

Parameters:
procId - The new order item process id. "0" represents no process.
Returns:
The old proccess id if different from the new process id or null otherwise.
